title: >>> The FINAL Week
body_text:
The wait continues ...
DODGEBALL 20 is unquestionably the most anticipated event ever, and for good reason. Besides the obvious fact that it is the 20th installment of dodgeball, it is also the most long awaited as well (between events). As soon as DODGEBALL 19 concluded, all knew the forthcoming event, DODGEBALL 20, would not take place that next weekend, but the following Friday; for many, an antagonizing 13 days. However, those 13 days are just about half-over: one week remains.
For the second time in this incredible journey, "Dodgeball Excellence" awards will be given to standout players for various talents and skills. The number of awards is currently undecided but a final decision will be made within the next week.
The Hall of Fame will see another induction of stars. The original six, comprised of Dan Spengeman, Mike Rosinski, Lauren Freda, Justin Pierce, Diana DiBuccio, and Chris Adams, will be joined by a "New Class". Those deserving individuals will be revealed to the world next week.
Remember, DODGEBALL 20 will start at 6PM due to the above ceremonies taking place.
*On a final note, please answer the questions in the email sent earlier in the week. Answers will be posted here on the dodgeball website.*
body_html:
The wait continues ...

DODGEBALL 20 is unquestionably the most anticipated event ever, and for good reason. Besides the obvious fact that it is the 20th installment of dodgeball, it is also the most long awaited as well (between events). As soon as DODGEBALL 19 concluded, all knew the forthcoming event, DODGEBALL 20, would not take place that next weekend, but the following Friday; for many, an antagonizing 13 days. However, those 13 days are just about half-over: one week remains.

For the second time in this incredible journey, "Dodgeball Excellence" awards will be given to standout players for various talents and skills. The number of awards is currently undecided but a final decision will be made within the next week.

The Hall of Fame will see another induction of stars. The original six, comprised of Dan Spengeman, Mike Rosinski, Lauren Freda, Justin Pierce, Diana DiBuccio, and Chris Adams, will be joined by a "New Class". Those deserving individuals will be revealed to the world next week.

Remember, DODGEBALL 20 will start at 6PM due to the above ceremonies taking place.

*On a final note, please answer the questions in the email sent earlier in the week. Answers will be posted here on the dodgeball website.*
